This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique features and benefits it offers. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer
